subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Landon Slone is a freshman walk-on who has become a spark plug for the surging Wildcats heading into Sunday’s showdown with archrival No. 18 Louisville.
snippet: Landon Slone is a freshman walk-on who has become a spark plug for the surging Wildcats heading into Sunday’s showdown with archrival No. 18 Louisville.
